original_text: But now you have turned back to your old ways. You have refused to give me honour. You had let your slaves go free, as they wanted to do. But now you have forced them to work for you as your slaves again.
korean_text: 너희가 돌이켜 내 이름을 더럽히고 각기 놓아 그들의 마음대로 자유롭게 하였던 노비를 끌어다가 다시 너희에게 복종시켜 너희의 노비로 삼았도다

sentences.original_text: But now you have turned back to your old ways.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 너희는 옛 방식으로 돌아갔다.

sentences.original_text: You have refused to give me honour.
You had let your slaves go free,
But now you have forced them to work for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 너희는 그들이 너희를 위해 일하도록 강요했다.
